programme.title: U.S. Open Golf Official Film 2013
programme.desc: A chance to relive the 2013 US Open at Merion Golf Club in Ardmore, Pennsylvania. America's Webb Simpson claimed a narrow one-stroke victory the previous year.

programme.title: U.S. Open Golf Official Film 2014
programme.desc: The story of the 2014 US Open Championship at the No. 2 Course of the Pinehurst Resort in North Carolina. England's Justin Rose came into this event as the defending champion.

programme.title: U.S. Open Golf Official Film 2015
programme.desc: The official film of the 2015 US Open, one of golf's four majors. Martin Kaymer went in as the defending champion from 2014.

programme.title: U.S. Open Golf Official Film 2016
programme.desc: The official film of the 2016 US Open. Hosted at Oakmont Country Club in Pennsylvania, one of the world's most difficult courses, Jordan Spieth came in as the defending champion.

programme.title: U.S. Open Golf Official Film 2017
programme.desc: The official film of the 2017 US Open. Hosted at Erin Hills in Wisconsin, Dustin Johnson came into the tournament as the defending champion from the previous year.

programme.title: PGA Tour: The Cut
programme.desc: A look behind the scenes of the PGA Tour. Follow the world's best players as they prepare for the big events in 2025.

programme.title: HotelPlanner Tour Golf
programme.desc: Tournament highlights from the HotelPlanner Tour's visit to Lucerne for the Swiss Challenge at Golf Sempach.

programme.title: U.S. Open Golf Official Film 2018
programme.desc: The official film of the 2018 US Open, held at Shinnecock Hills Golf Course. On an exceptionally challenging course, Brooks Koepka was aiming to retain his title from 2017.

programme.title: U.S. Open Golf Official Film 2019
programme.desc: The official film of the 2019 US Open from the iconic Pebble Beach Golf Links. It was to be a memorable tournament on the California coast for a first-time Major winner.

programme.title: U.S. Open Golf Official Film 2020
programme.desc: The official film of the 2020 US Open from Winged Foot Golf Club, the scene of Bryson DeChambeau's triumph, as he outlasted the debutant Matthew Wolff.

programme.title: PGA Tour Originals: Tiger 2000
programme.desc: A behind-the-scenes look at one of the most iconic seasons in golf as Tiger Woods changed the landscape of the sport securing nine victories, including three Major championships.

programme.title: McGinley & Chamblee At The US Open
programme.desc: Join Paul McGinley and Brandel Chamblee as they preview the action ahead of round one of the 2025 US Open Championship at Oakmont Country Club.

programme.title: Live U.S. Open Golf Round 1
programme.desc: The opening round of the 125th US Open from Oakmont Country Club. Last year, Bryson DeChambeau snatched the second of his two US Open wins, capitalising on Rory McIlroy's late collapse.

programme.title: U.S. Open Golf Official Film 2021
programme.desc: The official film of the 2021 US Open from the coastal course of Torrey Pines, setting the stage for Jon Rahm to ride a wave of victory in the Golden State of California.

programme.title: U.S. Open Golf R1 Highlights
programme.desc: The opening round of the US Open from Oakmont Country Club. Last year, Bryson DeChambeau snatched the second of his two US Open wins, capitalising on Rory McIlroy's late collapse. (12.06)

programme.title: U.S. Open Golf Official Film 2022
programme.desc: The official film of the 2022 US Open - the year England's Matt Fitzpatrick completed a nine-year journey, becoming only the second man to win a US Amateur and US Open on the same course.

programme.desc: The opening round of the US Open from Oakmont Country Club. Last year, Bryson DeChambeau snatched the second of his two US Open wins, capitalising on Rory McIlroy's late collapse. (12.06)
